definitions.definition: A covered walk with an open colonnade on one side, running along the walls of buildings that surround a quadrangle ; especially:

subdefinitions.definition: such an arcade in a monastery;
such an arcade fitted with representations of the stages of Christ's Passion.

definitions.definition: A place , especially a monastery or convent , devoted to religious seclusion.

main_definition: A covered walk with an open colonnade on one side, running along the walls of buildings that surround a quadrangle ; especially:
secondary_definitions: A place , especially a monastery or convent , devoted to religious seclusion.
